ISSUE.TITLE: RFE: awx-cli job monitor command
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### ISSUE TYPE - Feature Idea ##### SUMMARY Add a monitor parameter to the job resource with cli to be able to monitor currently running jobs. Currently, it is only possible to monitor a job a launch with the --monitor flag. (similar to https://tower-cli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/api_ref/resources/job.html#tower_cli.resources.job.Resource.monitor)
